build.beforeBuildCommand: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& { if (-not $env:NOTES_APP_ROOT) { throw 'NOTES_APP_ROOT not set' }; Set-Location $env:NOTES_APP_ROOT; & .\scripts\frontend.ps1 build }"
build.beforeDevCommand: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& { if (-not $env:NOTES_APP_ROOT) { throw 'NOTES_APP_ROOT not set' }; Set-Location $env:NOTES_APP_ROOT; & .\scripts\frontend.ps1 dev }"
